channel.title: Curse Headicons not showing

item.title: Curse Headicons not showing
item.dc:creator: @omgitsbob12 omgitsbob12
item.description:
@omgitsbob12 wrote:

I cache packed all the new headicons, expanded the size of arrays here:

							if (player.headIcon < 18) {
								headIcons[player.headIcon].drawSprite(spriteDrawX - 12, spriteDrawY - l);
								l += 18;
							}
				for (int j4 = 0; j4 < 18; j4++) {
					headIcons[j4] = new Sprite(mediaArchive, "headicons_prayer", j4);
				}

But they still don’t show up…

if I call something like p.headIcon = 5, it will show redemption prayer. But p.headIcon = 17 will not show soulsplit.

Does anyone have any clue how to add them?

Proof I cache packed:

Read full topic
